sentences.sContent: I helped him choose the furniture for his house.
sentences.sCn: 我帮他挑选房子里用的家具。

sentences.sContent: I can’t think of a single piece of furniture in my house that I bought new.
sentences.sCn: 我想不出家里有哪件家具是新买的。

sentences.sContent: ...I found some used furniture that was dirt cheap...

trans.tranOther: large objects such as chairs, tables, beds, and cupboards
